mapper.sql: STATION_NO, STATION_NM, AREA, FIRE_HEAD, TEL, LAT, LON
mapper.select:
SELECT FROM FIRE_STATION WHERE LAT BETWEEN #{minLat} AND #{maxLat} AND LON BETWEEN #{minLon} AND #{maxLon}
AND ( STATION_NM LIKE '%' || #{q} || '%' OR AREA LIKE '%' || #{q} || '%' OR FIRE_HEAD LIKE '%' || #{q} || '%' )
ORDER BY STATION_NM FETCH FIRST
#{limit} 500
ROWS ONLY

SELECT DISTINCT AREA FROM FIRE_STATION
AREA LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
ORDER BY AREA FETCH FIRST
#{limit} 10
ROWS ONLY

SELECT DISTINCT STATION_NM FROM FIRE_STATION
STATION_NM LIKE #{prefix} || '%'
AND AREA = #{area}
ORDER BY STATION_NM FETCH FIRST
#{limit} 10
ROWS ONLY

SELECT CASE WHEN REGEXP_LIKE(AREA, '군') THEN REGEXP_SUBSTR(AREA, '^[^ ]+ [^ ]+ 군') WHEN REGEXP_LIKE(AREA, '구') THEN REGEXP_SUBSTR(AREA, '^[^ ]+ [^ ]+ 구') ELSE REGEXP_SUBSTR(AREA, '^[^ ]+ [^ ]+') END AS REGION, COUNT(*) AS FIRE_STATION_CNT FROM FIRE_STATION GROUP BY CASE WHEN REGEXP_LIKE(AREA, '군') THEN REGEXP_SUBSTR(AREA, '^[^ ]+ [^ ]+ 군') WHEN REGEXP_LIKE(AREA, '구') THEN REGEXP_SUBSTR(AREA, '^[^ ]+ [^ ]+ 구') ELSE REGEXP_SUBSTR(AREA, '^[^ ]+ [^ ]+') END ORDER BY FIRE_STATION_CNT DESC
